languages.text: {n}Когитатор мигает и кряхтит, прежде чем вывести на экран полотно текста.{/n} "Великий Парсимус Девейн намерен покорить {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}, а также построить самое величественное сооружение, что будет сиять в веках, прославляя создателя и потомков — Футфол, дворец меж звезд. Слава деяний великого Парсимуса будет жить в веках, а его грандиозные замыслы..." {n}Когитатор шипит, кряхтит, пытается продуть внутренности, изрыгая из щелей потоки пыли и мусора.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Когитатор мигает и кряхтит, прежде чем вывести на экран полотно текста.{/n} "Великий Парсимус Девейн намерен покорить простор Коронус, а также построить самое величественное сооружение, что будет сиять в веках, прославляя создателя и потомков — Футфол, дворец меж звезд. Слава деяний великого Парсимуса будет жить в веках, а его грандиозные замыслы..." {n}Скатившись откуда-то с верхних панелей, по экрану стекает струйка грибной похлебки, которую едят местные рабочие. Она быстро увязает в комках пыли и застывает.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The cogitator flickers and grunts before displaying a tapestry of text.{/n} "The great Parsimus Dewain intends to conquer the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and build the most grandiose structure, which will shine through the ages, praising the names of its creator and his descendants — Footfall, the palace in the stars. The glory of the great Parsimus's deeds will live on throughout the ages, and his grand designs..." {n}The cogitator hisses and grunts as it tries to clean its insides by spewing out dust and detritus through its cracks.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когитатор мигает и кряхтит, прежде чем вывести на экран полотно текста.{/n} "Великий Парсимус Девейн намерен покорить {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}, а также построить самое величественное сооружение, что будет сиять в веках, прославляя создателя и потомков — Футфол, дворец меж звезд. Слава деяний великого Парсимуса будет жить в веках, а его грандиозные замыслы..." {n}Когитатор шипит, кряхтит, пытается продуть внутренности, изрыгая из щелей потоки пыли и мусора.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cogitator flickers and grunts before displaying a tapestry of text.{/n} "The great Parsimus Dewain intends to conquer the Koronus Expanse as well as build the most grandiose structure, which will shine through the ages, praising the names of its creator and his descendants — Footfall, the palace in the stars. The glory of the great Parsimus's deeds will live on throughout the ages, and his grand designs..." {n}The cogitator hisses and grunts as it tries to clean its innards by puffing out dust and trash from its cracks.{/n}

The glory of the great Parsimus's deeds will live on throughout the ages, and his grand designs..." {n}The cogitator hisses and grunts as it tries to clean its innards by puffing out dust and trash from its cracks.{/n}

The glory of the great Parsimus's deeds will live on throughout the ages, and his grand designs..." {n}The cogitator hisses and grunts as it tries to clean its insides by spewing out dust and detritus through its cracks.{/n}

languages.text: {n}考算機が機械音を発しつつ何度か点滅し、その後画面に長文が表示された。{/n}「偉大なるパルシムス・ドウェインは{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を征服し、最も壮大な建造物を建設しようと試みている。栄誉あるパルシムスの偉業の栄光は時代を超えて創設者と彼の子孫の名を称え続けるだろう。その名も星の宮廷、フットフォール。彼の壮大な設計は…」{n}考算機はかすれた機械音とノイズを発しながら、隙間からほこりやゴミを吐き出して内部を掃除しようとしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator flickers and grunts before displaying a tapestry of text.{/n} "The great Parsimus Dewain intends to conquer the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and build the most grandiose structure, which will shine through the ages, praising the names of its creator and his descendants — Footfall, the palace in the stars. The glory of the great Parsimus's deeds will live on throughout the ages, and his grand designs..." {n}The cogitator hisses and grunts as it tries to clean its insides by spewing out dust and detritus through its cracks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}考算機が機械音を発しつつ何度か点滅し、その後画面に長文が表示された。{/n}「偉大なるパルシムス・ドウェインは{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を征服し、最も壮大な建造物を建設しようと試みている。栄誉あるパルシムスの偉業の栄光は時代を超えて創設者と彼の子孫の名を称え続けるだろう。その名も星の宮廷、フットフォール。彼の壮大な設計は…」{n}考算機はかすれた機械音とノイズを発しながら、隙間からほこりやゴミを吐き出して内部を掃除しようとしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}沉思者的屏幕闪烁着，发出了低鸣声，随后显示出一连串文本。{/n}“伟大的帕西姆斯·德维恩打算征服{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}，建造整片扩区中最宏伟的建筑——落脚港。这座星际宫殿将闪耀千古，永久颂扬它的创始人以及他的后代。伟大的帕西莫斯将彪炳千古，而他的宏伟构想……”{n}沉思者发出嘶嘶声和低鸣声，裂缝中喷出了灰尘和碎屑，试图清洁机器内部。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator flickers and grunts before displaying a tapestry of text.{/n} "The great Parsimus Dewain intends to conquer the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and build the most grandiose structure, which will shine through the ages, praising the names of its creator and his descendants — Footfall, the palace in the stars. The glory of the great Parsimus's deeds will live on throughout the ages, and his grand designs..." {n}The cogitator hisses and grunts as it tries to clean its insides by spewing out dust and detritus through its cracks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}思考器的屏幕闪烁着，发出了低鸣声，随后显示出一连串文本。{/n}“伟大的帕西姆斯·德维恩打算征服{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}，建造整片扩区中最宏伟的建筑——落脚港。这座星际宫殿将闪耀千古，永久颂扬它的创始人以及他的后代。伟大的帕西莫斯将彪炳千古，而他的宏伟构想……”{n}思考器发出嘶嘶声和低鸣声，裂缝中喷出了灰尘和碎屑，试图清洁机器内部。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cogitador parpadea y gruñe antes de mostrar un tapiz de texto.{/n} «El gran Parsimus Dewain tiene intención de conquistar la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} y construir la estructura más grandiosa, que resplandecerá a través de las eras en alabanza de su creador y sus descendientes: Paso, el palacio de las estrellas. La gloria de las gestas del gran Parsimus perdurará, y sus grandiosos diseños...». {n}El cogitador sisea y gruñe, intentando limpiar su interior expulsando polvo y mugre por sus grietas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator flickers and grunts before displaying a tapestry of text.{/n} "The great Parsimus Dewain intends to conquer the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and build the most grandiose structure, which will shine through the ages, praising the names of its creator and his descendants — Footfall, the palace in the stars. The glory of the great Parsimus's deeds will live on throughout the ages, and his grand designs..." {n}The cogitator hisses and grunts as it tries to clean its insides by spewing out dust and detritus through its cracks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cogitador parpadea y gruñe antes de mostrar un tapiz de texto.{/n} «El gran Parsimus Dewain tiene intención de conquistar la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} y construir la estructura más grandiosa, que resplandecerá a través de las eras en alabanza de su creador y sus descendientes: Paso, el palacio de las estrellas. La gloria de las gestas del gran Parsimus perdurará, y sus grandiosos diseños...». {n}El cogitador sisea y gruñe, intentando limpiar su interior expulsando polvo y mugre por sus grietas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le cogitateur clignote et grogne avant d'afficher un mur de texte.{/n} « Le grand Parsimus Dewain a l'intention de conquérir les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et d'y construire la plus grandiose des structures, qui traversera les âges et fera entrer son nom et celui de ses descendants dans l'histoire : Castel, le palais des étoiles. La gloire des hauts faits de Parsimus perdurera à jamais et ses ambitieux projets... » {n}Le cogitateur siffle et hoquette en tentant d'expulser la poussière et les détritus qui l'encombrent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator flickers and grunts before displaying a tapestry of text.{/n} "The great Parsimus Dewain intends to conquer the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and build the most grandiose structure, which will shine through the ages, praising the names of its creator and his descendants — Footfall, the palace in the stars. The glory of the great Parsimus's deeds will live on throughout the ages, and his grand designs..." {n}The cogitator hisses and grunts as it tries to clean its insides by spewing out dust and detritus through its cracks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cogitateur clignote et grogne avant d'afficher un mur de texte.{/n} « Le grand Parsimus Dewain a l'intention de conquérir les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et d'y construire la plus grandiose des structures, qui traversera les âges et fera entrer son nom et celui de ses descendants dans l'histoire : Castel, le palais des étoiles. La gloire des hauts faits de Parsimus perdurera à jamais et ses ambitieux projets... » {n}Le cogitateur siffle et hoquette en tentant d'expulser la poussière et les détritus qui l'encombrent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Cogitator flackert und stöhnt und zeigt schließlich einen Text an.{/n} "Der große Parsimus Dewain möchte die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} erobern und eine erhabene Struktur errichten, die die Zeitalter überdauert und die Namen ihres Schöpfers und seiner Nachfahren preist – Footfall, der Palast in den Sternen. Der Ruhm der Taten des großen Parsimus wird die Zeitalter überdauern, und seine großen Vorhaben ..." {n}Der Cogitator zischt und ächzt, als er versucht, sein Inneres zu reinigen, indem er Staub und Schutt durch seine Ritzen ausspuckt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator flickers and grunts before displaying a tapestry of text.{/n} "The great Parsimus Dewain intends to conquer the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and build the most grandiose structure, which will shine through the ages, praising the names of its creator and his descendants — Footfall, the palace in the stars. The glory of the great Parsimus's deeds will live on throughout the ages, and his grand designs..." {n}The cogitator hisses and grunts as it tries to clean its insides by spewing out dust and detritus through its cracks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Cogitator flackert und stöhnt und zeigt schließlich einen Text an.{/n} "Der große Parsimus Dewain möchte die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} erobern und eine erhabene Struktur errichten, die die Zeitalter überdauert und die Namen ihres Schöpfers und seiner Nachfahren preist – Footfall, der Palast in den Sternen. Der Ruhm der Taten des großen Parsimus wird die Zeitalter überdauern, und seine großen Vorhaben ..." {n}Der Cogitator zischt und ächzt, als er versucht, sein Inneres zu reinigen, indem er Staub und Schutt durch seine Ritzen ausspuckt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayar yanıp sönüyor, tıkırdıyor, derken upuzun bir metin gösteriyor.{/n} "Ulu Parsimus Dewain, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ni{/g} fethetme ve olabilecek en ihtişamlı yapıyı inşa etme niyetindedir. Asırlar boyu ışıldayacak ve yaratıcısı ile torunlarının isimlerini yüceltecek bu yapı, yıldızlar arasındaki saray Binliman'dır. Ulu Parsimus'un başarılarının şanı çağlar boyunca yaşayacak ve onun muazzam tasarımları..." {n}Kavramsayar, içindeki tozları ve döküntüleri çatlaklarından dışarı silkeleyip temizlenmeye çalışırcasına tıslayıp hırıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator flickers and grunts before displaying a tapestry of text.{/n} "The great Parsimus Dewain intends to conquer the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and build the most grandiose structure, which will shine through the ages, praising the names of its creator and his descendants — Footfall, the palace in the stars. The glory of the great Parsimus's deeds will live on throughout the ages, and his grand designs..." {n}The cogitator hisses and grunts as it tries to clean its insides by spewing out dust and detritus through its cracks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kavramsayar yanıp sönüyor, tıkırdıyor, ardından uzun bir metin gösteriyor.{/n} "Ulu Parsimus Dewain, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ni fethetme ve olabilecek en görkemli yapıyı inşa etme niyetinde. Öyle bir yapı ki yaratıcısının ve onun soyundan gelenlerin isimlerini yüceltecek: Binliman. Yıldızların içindeki saray. Ulu Parsimus'un başarılarının namı çağlar boyunca yaşayacak ve onun muazzam tasarımları..." {n}Kavramsayar, içindeki tozları ve döküntüleri çatlaklarından dışarı silkeleyip temizlenmeye çalışırcasına tıslayıp tıkırdıyor.{/n}
